import React, { Component } from 'react'; import "../checkbox.css" import authService from '../services/auth.service'; class Checkedd extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.markcheckbox = this.markcheckbox.bind(this); this.state = { } } /** * * @param {*} e * @param {*} day * check the box send to backend. */ async markcheckbox(day) { debugger let ob = this.props.student.syncedCheckboxes ob[day]=!ob[day] this.props.dispatch({[this.props.state.currentuser.students[this.props.student.__v].syncedCheckboxes]:ob}) authService.changeData("student", this.props.student._id, {syncedCheckboxes: ob} ) } render() { return (
) } } export default Checkedd;
